title: Deploy theme builder
description: Builds the theme and deploys it to Shopify with the passed env configuration ('development' by default)

outputPath.description: Path where output will be placed.

buildConfiguration.description: Name of the configuration to be used in the theme build process.

themekitEnv.description: Name of the themekit config.yml environment to be used in the deployment.

open.description: Open theme preview in the broswer when the deployment is done.
